QuestData.Title: The Secrets of Gorgrond
QuestData.Description: Commander, I will leave my forces to secure this pass, but I will not sit idle while our enemy prepares for another attack.$b$bI want to take the fight to the heart of the Iron Horde at Blackrock, and to do that we are going to need to go where few orcs dare tread.$b$bGorgrond.$b$bIt is a savage place, filled with giants and monsters of every sort.$b$bWill you dare these wilds with me so that we might strike at the foundries of the Iron Horde?
